Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A joint resolution approving the location of the Black Revolutionary War Patriots Memorial.

summary.text: Approves the location of a commemorative work in the District of Columbia to honor the slaves and free black persons who served as soldiers and sailors, or provided civilian assistance during the American Revolution and to honor the black men, women, and children who ran away from slavery, or filed petitions with courts and legislatures seeking their freedom.

titles.title: A joint resolution approving the location of the Black Revolutionary War Patriots Memorial.
